com.rand42.database

Interface IUsersDataSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UsersDataSource

    public interface IUsersDataSource
    Class that interfaces with the database for users

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Closes the datasource.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open()
          throws android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException
        Opens the datasource. Must be called before any other operation
        Throws:
        android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the datasource. Should be called after operations are finished

      • createUser

        boolean createUser(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String email,
                 java.lang.String password,
                 boolean isAdmin)
        Creates a new user
        Parameters:
        name - Name
        email - Email. UNIQUE
        password - Password
        isAdmin - Admin status
        Returns:
        Success if the user was created or not

      • getUserById

        User getUserById(long id)
        Gets a user by an id
        Parameters:
        id - The id param of the user
        Returns:
        The User

      • getUserByEmail

        User getUserByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Gets a user by email address
        Parameters:
        email - The email address
        Returns:
        The User

      • loginUser

        User loginUser(java.lang.String email,
             java.lang.String password)
        Checks credentials, returns a user or null
        Parameters:
        email - Email
        password - Password
        Returns:
        User if credentials match, null otherwise

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser(long id)
        Deletes a user by id
        Parameters:
        id - The id param
        Returns:
        Success or non success

      • getAllUsers

        java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()
        Gets all the users from the database
        Returns:
        A list of all the users

      • lockUser

        void lockUser(long id)
        Sets a user's lock status to true.
        Parameters:
        id - The id param of the user

      • unlockUser

        void unlockUser(long id)
        Sets a user's lock status to false
        Parameters:
        id - The id param of the user
